mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(center_code), 0000000) as centerCode FROM CENTER

select center_code as "centerCode" , center_name as "centerName" , center_tel as "centerTel" , center_address as "centerAddress" , center_guide as "centerGuide" , center_opening_date as "centerOpeningDate" , center_closing_date as "centerClosingDate" FROM CENTER

SELECT C.center_code AS "centerCode" , C.center_name AS "centerName" , C.center_address AS "centerAddress" FROM center C LEFT OUTER JOIN mapping M ON C.center_code = M.center_code WHERE M.user_code IS NULL
